```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(googlesheets4)
library(patchwork)
library(hrbrthemes)

extrafont::loadfonts()

if(!sheets_has_token()){
  sheets_auth(email = 'schneeman@gmail.com')
}

id <- NULL
if(sheets_has_token()) {
  sheet <- sheets_find(pattern = '2019 Fall Annual Survey Data_Breakdown by Scale')
  id <- sheet$id
}

survey <- sheets_get(id)

survey_df <- sheets_read(id, sheet=survey$sheet$name[1], skip = 2)
```

## Explore Austin 2019 Survey

Survey Date: 2019

## Explorer Gender Breakdown

```{r gender}
survey_df %>% group_by(Gender) %>% summarize(ct = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Gender, y=ct, fill=Gender)) +
  geom_col() + theme_ipsum() +
  scale_fill_ipsum() + theme(legend.position = "none")
```

## School Data
```{r school, warning = FALSE}
grades <- survey_df %>% group_by(Grade) %>% summarize(ct = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Grade, y=ct)) +
  geom_col() + theme_ipsum() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(
    title = "Explorer Grade Level"
  )

lunch <- survey_df %>% mutate(`Do you receive free/reduced lunch?` = if_else(`Do you receive free/reduced lunch?` %in% c('Yes', 'No'), `Do you receive free/reduced lunch?`, "I don't know")) %>%
  group_by(`Do you receive free/reduced lunch?`) %>% summarize(ct = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=`Do you receive free/reduced lunch?`, y=ct)) +
  geom_col() + theme_ipsum() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(
    title = "Explorer Free Lunch"
  )

last_gpa <- function(gpa_string) {
  parsed <- str_split(gpa_string, "\\|", simplify = TRUE)
  parsed[length(parsed)]
}

survey_df %>% rowwise() %>%
  mutate(last_gpa = last_gpa(`Overall Grade Point Average (GPA) in school`)) %>% View()

# arrange the plots
lunch + grades
```
